DOC.brief_title: Clinical Effectiveness Various Professionally Applied Fluoride Prophylaxes Groups High Risk
DOC.detailed_description: The study compare prophylactic therapeutic clinical effectiveness two fluoride varnish child high caries risk . It hypothesize , use Fluor Protector S ( I ) fluoride varnish child deciduous teeth high risk caries ( P ) reduce caries activity/remineralisation carious enamel spot ( transformation White Spot Lesion D ( decay ) ) ( O ) , similarly occur use Duraphat varnish ( C ) . The question set base Caries Assessment Risk Management system base occurrence major caries causative agent ( biological medical ) , also protective/preventive one . Questions related social economical status leave difficulty get answer honestly . Teeth score accord International Caries Detection System II classification , oral hygiene accord Greene Vermillion simplify Oral Hygiene Index ( OHI-S ) ( 1964 ) . Children parents/guardians receive hygienic , dietary prophylactic guideline .
